name: Chitin
description: Harvested from insectoid or crustacean monsters. Lighter than metal, but still strong and durable.

name: Dragon Bone
description: Carved from the bones of ancient dragons. Holds magical properties and is incredibly durable.

name: Ironwood
description: A rare wood that has been infused with earth magic, making it as hard as iron but retaining wood's flexibility.
properties: Weapon: Can be wielded by druids without penalty. Shield: -1 load (min. 0).

name: Silver
description: Pure silver forged into weapons and armor. Effective against undead and certain supernatural creatures.
properties: Weapon: +2 damage vs. undead and lycanthropes.

name: Cold Iron
description: Iron forged without fire, using ancient techniques. Disrupts fey magic and supernatural abilities.
properties: Weapon: +2 damage vs. fey and demons. Ignores supernatural damage resistance.

name: Mithril
description: A lightweight, silver-colored metal that is stronger than steel and naturally resists magic.
properties: Armor/Shield: -2 load (min. 0), +1 resistance vs. magic damage.

name: Adamantine
description: An incredibly hard, dark metal that can cut through almost anything and is nearly indestructible.
properties: Weapon: +2 Durability, ignores armor properties. Armor: +2 Durability, immune to critical hits.

name: Meteor Iron
description: Metal from fallen stars, naturally magical and incredibly rare. Pulses with celestial energy.
properties: Weapon: +1 damage vs. extraplanar creatures. Glows softly (provides dim light).

name: Darksteel
description: A black metal that absorbs light and shadow. Favored by assassins and shadow magic practitioners.
properties: Weapon: +1 stealth bonus when drawn. Armor: +1 stealth bonus.

name: Crystal Steel
description: Steel infused with magical crystals, creating a translucent, resonant metal that amplifies magic.
properties: Spell Catalyst: +1 spell damage. Weapon: Can channel spell effects.

name: Voidstone
description: A dark, non-reflective stone that seems to absorb light and magical energy. Extremely rare.
properties: Armor/Shield: +2 resistance vs. magic damage. Spell Catalyst: Can cast void/shadow spells.

name: Celestial Gold
description: Gold blessed by celestial beings, radiating divine energy and purity.
properties: Weapon: +2 damage vs. undead and demons. Radiates bright light (medium range).

name: Dragonscale
description: Scales from ancient dragons, each type providing different magical resistances.
properties: Armor/Shield: +1 resistance vs. elemental damage (fire, ice, lightning, or acid).

name: Feysteel
description: Metal forged in the Feywild, shifting between reality and dream. Unpredictable but powerful.
properties: Weapon: Critical hits cause confusion (1 round). Armor: +1 resistance vs. enchantment effects.

name: Shadowsilk
description: Silk woven from shadow spider webs, lighter than air but stronger than steel when worn.
